name: perkiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality or state of being happy and full of energy: Beneath her surface perkiness she is awfully dull. Her perkiness was both endearing and a little annoying. See
perky
More examplesFewer examplesShe is the reigning world champion, a bundle of perkiness and power. He felt so well-rested that friends remarked on his unexpected morning perkiness. He was a model of perkiness, despite the fact that the show was going out live at 4.30 a.m. local time.
